QuestData.Title: Into the Breach!
QuestData.Description: Ready yourself, $c. I'm dispatching you to Light's Breach, northeast of here.$b$bI've received word that the Scourge are making a push to take over Zul'Drak.$b$b<Valus stares you dead in the eyes.>$b$bThis will not come to pass.$b$bSee to it that you assist in the destruction of the Scourge there. The light demands it.$b$bDismissed.
QuestData.LogDescription: Crusader Valus at Light's Trust wants you to report to Sergeant Riannah at Light's Breach in Zul'Drak.
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent. Valus must have received my report.$b$bLet's get to work, $r.
